description: Expected output patterns for skill completion verification

intent-analyzer.verification_message: Intent analysis must output understood_intent and confidence, then invoke prompt-architect

prompt-architect.verification_message: Prompt optimization must output optimized_request and invoke a planning skill

smart-bug-fix.verification_message: Bug fix must identify root cause, apply fix, spawn Task agents, and call TodoWrite

feature-dev-complete.verification_message: Feature development must produce architecture, implementation, tests, spawn agents, and track with TodoWrite

code-review-assistant.verification_message: Code review must output summary, issues, recommendations and spawn reviewer agents

functionality-audit.verification_message: Functionality audit must verify execution and output audit results

theater-detection-audit.verification_message: Theater detection must output theater score and list issues found

cascade-orchestrator.verification_message: Cascade orchestrator must create workflow plan, execute stages, and track progress

swarm-orchestration.verification_message: Swarm orchestration must configure swarm, spawn multiple agents, and track with TodoWrite

agent-creator.verification_message: Agent creator must produce agent spec, system prompt, and write agent file

research-driven-planning.verification_message: Research planning must output research, plan, risks, and track with TodoWrite

deep-research-orchestrator.verification_message: Deep research must complete literature review, methodology, findings with agent coordination

github-workflow-automation.verification_message: GitHub workflow must produce workflow file and configuration

pair-programming.verification_message: Pair programming must produce code changes and verify results

default_pattern.verification_message: Skill must spawn Task agents and call TodoWrite
